scenes.title: Compras en el mercado

dialog.speaker: vendedor
dialog.translation: Good morning, what fruit are you looking for today?

dialog.speaker: aprendiz
dialog.line: Quiero medio kilo de fresas y un melon pequeno, por favor.
dialog.translation: I would like half a kilo of strawberries and a small melon, please.

dialog.speaker: vendedor
dialog.translation: That will be six euros. Anything else?

reflection: Usa cantidades especificas (medio kilo, un kilo).
